pages.title: Class Focus
pages.text: The misthophoroi belong to the $(l:classes/mercenary)mercenary$() class. The misthophoroi are the best example of the mercenaries. Loyal to none, hired by all.

pages.title: Weapon Focus
pages.text: The weapon focus of the misthophoroi is a pike. Having mastered the weapon with the biggest reach possible, a misthios can easily hold someone back while dealing enough damage.

pages.title: The Pike
pages.text: When a pike is used by a misthios, he gains +50% base damage. However there is one exception, any weapon with the enchantment 'Legendary Weapon: Pike' also gains this boost, no matter the weapon.

pages.title: Unique Ability
pages.text: While their range is long, once the enemy gets close their advantage becomes a great disadvantage. That's why they weaken their enemy before this happens. On hit the misthios gives the poison I effect for (time) which can be done every (time)
